name: Nuno Correia 0001
content: Nuno Correia Nuno Correia home publications projects teaching supervision Welcome I am a professor at Universidade NOVA de Lisboa (Computer Science Department, Faculty of Sciences and Technology), working on multimodal interaction and multimedia information processing. Currently, I coordinate the PhD Program in Digital Media at FCT/UNL. I am the coordinator of NOVA-LINCS. I am also involved in setting up the NOVA Institute of Art and Technology. Contacts DI/FCT/UNL, Quinta da Torre, 2825-114 CAPARICA, Portugal Phone: +351 1 294 85 36, Fax: +351 1 294 85 41 Email: nmc [at] fct.unl.pt all rights reserved - nuno correia - 2025 web design by sjl web design home | publications | projects | teaching | supervision
